Mother's love
;Heart Melting Story: pls read full: Awoman was admitted in hospital as she was suffering
;frm brain tumor.Her son & relatives were around her. She died within a few hrs. His son
;cried the whole day & became ill. He returnd home the next day n Wen he opened his
;moms cupboard, he found some tablets kept in a letter. In the letter it was written"TAKE
;THESE TABLETS DEAR.I knw u catch cold easily after crying." "MOTHERS LOVE- MAKE IT LIVE LONG
